inventory.commentary: Note: No VPC or idioms for this verb

sense.name: stand for, indicate
sense.commentary: Syntax is: NP1[agent] SIGNIFY NP2 NP1[instrument] SIGNIFY NP2[patient]
sense.examples: This morpheme signifies the plural in Spanish. 'It is the tale told by an idiot, full of sound and fury, signifying nothing.' -Hamlet The driver signified his intention to make a left turn.
